survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on office space design to enhance productivity, comfort, and collaboration.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current layout of your office workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current layout of your office workspace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following office amenities do you find most valuable for your productivity? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Randomize options to reduce bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following office amenities do you find most valuable for your productivity? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How often do you use collaborative spaces (e.g., meeting rooms, breakout areas) in the office?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale. Consider adding a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How often do you use collaborative spaces (e.g., meeting rooms, breakout areas) in the office?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the office layout to better support your work?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the office layout to better support your work?

questions.question_text: Do you prefer open-plan offices or private workspaces?
questions.client_notes: Ensure options are mutually exclusive. Randomize if necessary.

script.question_text: Do you prefer open-plan offices or private workspaces?

questions.question_text: How important is natural lighting in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point importance scale. Ensure question clarity.

script.question_text: How important is natural lighting in your workspace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following distractions affect your productivity in the current office setup? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with optional open text (MULTI_CHOICE).

script.question_text: Which of the following distractions affect your productivity in the current office setup? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of meeting rooms in the office?
questions.client_notes: Include a 'Not applicable' option for respondents who do not use meeting rooms.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of meeting rooms in the office?

questions.question_text: What type of seating arrangement do you prefer for collaborative work?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional open text (SINGLE_CHOICE).

script.question_text: What type of seating arrangement do you prefer for collaborative work?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions regarding office space design.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture final feedback. Limit response length to 1000 characters.

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions regarding office space design.
